title: Easy Veg Chowmein
description: A quick and flavorful Nepalese-style vegetarian noodle dish.
method: Heat oil in a pan or wok on high heat.
Add sliced onion and green chillies. Stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add capsicum and cabbage. Stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Add the boiled noodles and toss well.
Sprinkle chilli powder, chowmein masala, salt, and MSG.
Pour soy sauce and mix on high heat.
Stir-fry another 1–2 minutes.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup.

title: Val Papdi Curry
description: Easy, quick & tasty Nepalese-style flat beans curry.
method: Heat oil and temper cumin + fenugreek seeds.
Add garlic, green chilli, and onion. Sauté until golden.
Add diced potatoes + a pinch of salt. Cook for 2–3 mins.
Add val papdi, turmeric, and salt. Mix well.
Add chopped tomatoes. Cook until soft.
Add coriander powder, chilli powder, and garam masala.
Cover and cook until everything is soft and the oil separates.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Quick Egg Roll
description: A tasty, customizable egg roll perfect for snacks or meals.
method: Scramble eggs in a pan.
Lightly toast the flatbread or chapati.
Place scrambled egg on the flatbread.
Top with cheese, tomato, onion, and coriander.
Drizzle with tomato sauce and sriracha.
Roll tightly and serve warm.
